description:
Tame that frizz with My Soda Smooth Conditioner. Conscious haircare that is plant based, cruelty free & vegan.

Hair in need of some serious smoothing?
Give your hair a good old fashioned taming with our super smoothing plant based formula. Enriched with Organic Aloe Vera Juice to help increase shine. Rock that silky feel!

Good hair speaks louder than words!
No Parabens
No SLES & ALS
No Propylene Glycol
No Triclosan
No EDTA
No Harsh Detergents
No Petrochemical Cleansers
No Mineral Oils

Botanical actives.
Soap free.
Plant based.
Grey water safe.
Recycled plastic bottle.
Cruelty free / Vegan.

Botanical Actives

Plant Based

Soap Free

Grey Water Safe

Recycled Plastic Bottle

Cruelty Free & Vegan

Paraben & SLES Free
name: My Soda Conditioner Smooth 800ml
